trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Syracuse
There were no other sightings in Syracuse on or around April 5th 1978
divs: sighting detailsto whom it may concern, i was wondering why there has never been a documentary or investigation into the mid 1970���s up state new york massive and multiple ufo sightings? it has always seen strange to me, that over the years not one mention of that incident has been ever reported on. i was one of the many that saw something that night. i have never revealed the other witness that was with me that night or what she said and did. nor have i ever stated what her brother told me the next day but his encounter. plus when i was married to my x-wife pat, we saw a couple sightings that we both keep quite about. we have not talked about the sightings that we saw, in many, many years. but i am sure that her memories will be very similar to mine. if you would like to read my report, which i gave months later to an investigator, go to ( www.uisiom.com\ufo ), my report is there on my web site. if you have any question please feel free to contact me at, uisiom@hotmail.com, write to me at 11 appalachian dr. grantville, p.a. 17028, call at 1-717-469-9291. thank you jan richard bowles
